name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a proven track record in leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to create engaging and high-performance user interfaces. My technical proficiency includes extensive work with **UI/UX**, **animation**, and tools like **Figma** and **Framer** to enhance user experience and interactivity. I am skilled in utilizing **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber** for innovative visual solutions. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with **Playwright**, **Vitest**, and **Cypress** for end-to-end testing to ensure application reliability.

I thrive in environments that utilize modern technologies such as **AI** frameworks, including **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **LangChain**, **Stable Diffusion**, **ComfyUI**, and **Midjourney**, implementing intelligent features that elevate the user experience. My background also includes robust knowledge of **Node.js**, **Python**, and **Docker**, ensuring seamless integration with back-end processes. My ability to create functional applications while adhering to best practices and standards has consistently resulted in successful project outcomes, particularly in dynamic sectors like healthcare and finance.
